title: Why One of America’s Most Promising CX Riders is Retiring after Hitting Top 20: ‘It’s Not Economically Viable Anymore in the US’
content:
Scott Funston finishes 19th at cyclocross worlds, but financial realities force him to step away from elite racing: 'It's time to grow up and make money.'

Read the full article at Why One of America’s Most Promising CX Riders is Retiring after Hitting Top 20: ‘It’s Not Economically Viable Anymore in the US’ on Velo.
author: ahood
